snippet.title: [Undertale & Underswap: THANATOS] UNDEREVENT Trailer (Extended Cut)
snippet.description:
Follow Undertale Thanatos: https://gamejolt.com/games/thanos-and-the-nyeh/798805
Follow Underswap Thanatos: https://gamejolt.com/games/thanatos/547556

We're very happy to say that we made it to UNDEREVENT!
Working with them was a blast and an incredibly fun experience, they all were so nice and chill and we're happy everything turned out well.
If you somehow haven't watched the event yet, then what are you waiting for? It really will be worth your time!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ansCGZUhtVk&t=0s

We wanted to take a slighty different approach for the showcase of our project, and merged both Undertale and Underswap Thanatos into a single trailer.
The trailer itself is divided in two sections, the Undertale and the Underswap section. The Undertale section covers major parts of the prologue, while the Underswap section shows a bit of everything.

[Credits]
Trailer music by @Torblah 
Papyrus VA: @DarbyCupit 
Sans VA: @Bub8les 
Intro panels by Xeron, RedD7 and sly_v
Video Editing: Ari
-Massive thanks to Danae for some help with the trailer-

Game credits at the end of the video!

#underevent #thanatos
